alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 1:22PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM RELEASE IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Friday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 8.9 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening around 730 PM MDT.
